content:
The Spigen Liquid Air Armor Case is designed to be wireless charging compatible, which means you can charge your Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra wirelessly without having to remove the case. Here are some details about the wireless charging feature:

**Wireless Charging Compatibility:** The case is compatible with Qi-enabled wireless charging pads, which is the standard for wireless charging. This means you can use any Qi-compatible wireless charger with your phone and case.

**Fast Wireless Charging:** The good news is that the case does support fast wireless charging, but there's a catch. The case itself doesn't have built-in fast wireless charging capabilities, but it won't hinder the phone's built-in fast wireless charging feature. This means that if you use a fast wireless charger that supports 15W or higher wireless charging, your phone will still be able to charge quickly.

**Charging Speed:** To give you a better idea, here are some charging speeds you can expect with the Spigen Liquid Air Armor Case:

* Standard wireless charging: 5W
* Fast wireless charging: up to 15W (depending on the charger and phone's capabilities)

**Important Note:** To ensure fast wireless charging, make sure your wireless charger supports fast charging and is compatible with your phone. Also, keep in mind that the case may slightly slow down the charging speed due to the material and design, but it should still charge your phone quickly.

Overall, the Spigen Liquid Air Armor Case's wireless charging feature is convenient and easy to use. Just place your phone on a Qi-compatible wireless charger, and it will start charging. The case is designed to work seamlessly with your phone's wireless charging capabilities, making it a great choice for those who want the convenience of wireless charging.
